title: Why do I only have 4 slots in my showdown store and everyone else has 6?

replies.body:
It looks like you don't have enough unowned content that's applicable for a sale in Your Snowdown Shop. Other than Legendary/Ultimate/Limited skins, the skins you don't own also have to be at least 3 months old. Similar to you, I only have one offer in mine right now. 

Hope that helps clear things up! Happy holidays :)

Thank you for looking at my case. im confused. im looking over my account right now and i have several skins they fit the criteria.

Full machine viktor, mad scientist ziggs, fisherman fizz, dino gnar, captain voilbear, sultan GP, etc.
Maybe make an exception for people like that? Either OP spent a lot of money or won a lot of tournament RP, and I think the former is more likely, so why not throw them a bone?
Thanks for the support. I got most of my skins from both,  tourneys and paying for them.

Yeah, now that we have a method of offering players personalized offers this is a possibility for the future. I'm sorry that we can't deliver on it right now. 

I hope you and OP both have a cool offer to take advantage of for now, and if not, you can save up for a more exciting offer in the future! :D
